newsitem.title: USA: Raptor, V-One in marketing pact.
newsitem.headline: Raptor, V-One in marketing pact.

text.p: Raptor Systems Inc on Monday said it has entered into a marketing pact with V-ONE Corp whose terms include V-ONE's agreement to resell Raptor's firewall software.

The alliance pairs Raptor's Eagle' firewall product and V-ONE's SmartGate security software, which establishes secure communication and transaction channels for businesses over public networks like the Internet.
Firewalls are the software programs that restrict the flow of information between a company's network and the Internet in order to keep sensitive information private.
Financial details of the deal were not disclosed.
